:::: {.about-body}

I am a postoctoral researcher working at the interface between **_machine learning (ML)_** and **_molecular thermodynamics_**. 
My primary research interest is the formulation of physically consistent thermodynamic models leveraging new ML methods. 
I also focus on the implementation of thermodynamic open source libraries in the Julia language -- including the new ML models.

## {{< iconify octicon:star-24 >}} Interests {.interests}

- Thermodynamics
- Machine Learning
- Julia Language
- Transport Properties
- Molecular Simulations
- Open Source Software
